"The Team Counter":
"About the Team Counter

This is a counter for establishing and manage Teams. Players who are not already a member of a Team can form their own, and players who are already on a Team can view information about it.

Team Masters are also able to manage their Team here.

If a Team Master has not logged in for 30 days, any Manager can acquire Team Master authority here.

[Link to online manual]
